channel.title: Diablo III Official Game Site
channel.description: Diablo III is a genre-defining action-RPG set in Sanctuary, a world ravaged by the eternal conflict between angels and demons.

item.title: Diablo III PTR 2.7.4 |Preview
item.content:encoded: The Diablo III 2.7.4 PTR testing period begins on July 12 and will run for two weeks. Join us in testing a new seasonal theme, item changes, and more!

item.title: Diablo Hell's Ink Tattoo Shop Takeover Tour
item.content:encoded: The Diablo Hell’s Ink tattoo shop takeover tour is your chance to receive a custom tattoo, courtesy of the Burning Hells. Find out how to win!

item.title: Snatch Up Diablo Immortal Goodies For Your Favorite Games
item.content:encoded: In celebration of Diablo Immortal’s launch, Skarn’s forces have placed Immortal-themed goodies in Diablo III, Hearthstone, and Call of Duty: Mobile for you to collect!

item.title: Diablo III Celebrates 10 Years
item.content:encoded: Diablo III turns 10! Join us in celebrating this remarkably hellish entry to the Diablo storyline.

item.title: Season 26 | The Fall of the Nephalem | Now Live
item.content:encoded: Read on to learn more about the new seasonal theme and new balance changes in Patch 2.7.3!

item.title: Diablo 3 PTR 2.7.3 | Has Ended
item.content:encoded: Our two-week PTR testing period for the 2.7.3 update begins on March 10, and we're asking for your help to quell the tides of surging demons.

item.title: Diablo IV Quarterly Update—December 2021
item.content:encoded: Learn more about itemization, Paragon updates, and the visual effects of Diablo IV in this next Quarterly Developer Update.

item.title: The Darkening of Tristram Returns January 3, 2022!
item.content:encoded: Our anniversary event is fast approaching! Prepare to face mysterious cultists and enter a portal into Diablo's past.

item.title: Season 25 | The Lords of Hell | Has Ended
item.content:encoded: Season 25 is now live! Read on to learn more about Soul Shards and new balance changes in Patch 2.7.2!

item.title: Diablo 3 PTR 2.7.2 | Has ended
item.content:encoded: Our two-week PTR testing period for the 2.7.2 update begins on November 4, and we're asking for your help to quell the tides of surging demons.

item.title: Play Diablo® II: Resurrected™ During the Early Access & Open Beta
item.content:encoded: Learn more about the Diablo II: Resurrected Early Access & Open Beta. Get all the details and answers to your most pressing questions about these upcoming tests!
